document_data.mainbody:
Mahzed was a slave-trader and merchant from Thay.
Mahzed owned a wagon that he used to transport his goods and slaves. He armed himself with a dagger and hand crossbow.
In the middle of the , one of the wizards from a local Red Wizard enclave, led by a woman named Hinnar, began selling locals into slavery of her own initiative. This underling, Kizzaf, charmed victims to follow her out of town. Two such victims, Talf and Elonn were heavily drugged and sold to Mahzed, who then began transporting them along with two criminals, who willingly had sold themselves into slavery to pay off their own debts.
